Biography

I am a Teaching Assistant in the Computer Science Department at the University of Oklahoma. My research focuses on feature engineering and machine learning for classification tasks. I am passionate about developing efficient algorithms and exploring innovative approaches to solve real‐world problems.

My interests include data science, genetic programming, and applying artificial intelligence to academic research. Feel free to reach out if you’d like to discuss research ideas or potential collaborations!
